testcase.classname: Covers multiple search validation of google
testcase.name: validate search functionality withSoftware Testing

testcase.classname: This feature file is create to cover testing of OrangeHRM PIM flow
testcase.name: Create PIM and validate it
testcase.system-out: Given User is on OrangeHRM login page of OrangeHRM PIM POM..................passed And User login successfully with valid data for OrangeHRM PIM POM and clicks on login button of OrangeHRM PIM POM.passed And user clicks on PIM link of OrangeHRM PIM POM............................passed When User click on add button of OrangeHRM PIM POM..........................passed And Type input firstnm as Sharmila ,lastnm as Malkar ,empid as 4545 and click on save button of PIM create of OrangeHRM PIM POM.passed Then Navigate to PIM home page of OrangeHRM PIM POM.........................passed And Search newly created empid as 4545 of PIM create and Click on search button PIM create of OrangeHRM PIM POM.passed And Verify the result of PIM create for OrangeHRM POM.......................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
